jd: From: Abhishek Singh, Vyze Inc kabhishek@vyzeinc.com Reply to: kabhishek@vyzeinc.com Hi,Hope you are doing well today! My self Abhishek Kumar working as Technical recruiter at Vyze Inc. I have an exciting opportunity with one of our client. If interested send me your updated resume with contact details, expected pay rate along with below information.Job Description -JOB TITLE: Java/ J2EE Application Developer Duration: 6+ MonthLocation : RemoteMOI: Skype MUST HAVE:Requested Qualification Number Requested Qualification Notes to Agency: Points assigned will change depending on the number of Qualifications submitted There is no requirement to have 10 Qualifications. Only Number of Months is an allowable unit of measurement for experience. 1. 84 months experience with J2EE technologies including EJB, JDBC, JSP and XML. 2. 84 months experience with Java programming in an IBM development environment using IDE of IBM's Rational Application Developer (RAD) that are deployed to WebSphere Application Server (WAS). 3. 84 months of IBM DB2 experience working with DB2 databases and experience with XML schemas (definition, querying and automated generation). 4. 60 months experience in performance tuning applications interacting with databases. 5. 60 months of experience in IBM MQSeries 6. 60 months experience with an organization which includes technical design, development, maintenance, and end user support of complex system.
